main event: A bright yellowish object was observed through a bedroom window in Marietta, Ohio on March 3, 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed for over 15 minutes and described as stationary at 280 degrees azimuth., The witness used binoculars to observe the object., The sighting was later determined to be Venus., The observation was conducted by a mother and her child., The incident sparked interest in UFOs leading to a letter sent to the UFO Investigations office.
witness description: a mother and her child observing through a bedroom window
